channel.title: Rollback pls? :)
channel.description:
uhh so yeah, i was messing around with pistons and redstone, minding my own business... i flipped a switch and everything i have done in the past like 3 days disappeared. pics for proof with description at the bottom lol.
time this happend: would say around 12:30 or 1.
what i have learned? dont fuck with redstone unless you know what your doing... :P
[img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2rei1a9.png[/img]
image 1: the area was filled in at sea level with a small wheat farm. as you can see on the left, the area with redstone was what i was messing with when everything happened :S. there was also a large wall of cobblestone behind for protection.
[img]http://i55.tinypic.com/qn4iu8.jpg[/img]
overlooking the fince that used to be there. lake was filled up before this happened.
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/4hdpnb.png[/img]
another section of fence missing, along with my automated sugar cain farm. area was leveled with sea
[img]http://i55.tinypic.com/4r6w4m.png[/img]
house took some damage in the process.
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/330u52t.png[/img]
more missing fence.

item.title: Rollback pls? :)
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

eeh, mine was way too much work to replace in a day. my whole slime farm got taken out. it was a 16x16x46 empty square hole that i dug by myself lmao…

Read full topic

item.title: Rollback pls? :)
item.dc:creator: @Nokturth Nokturth
item.description:
@Nokturth wrote:

[quote=“zuppers, post:10, topic:410283”][quote author=Nokturth link=topic=511567.msg3712932#msg3712932 date=1313453731]
happened something like that to me, almost all the pistons and redstone in my city dissapeared.
i don’t want to build again all those fucking xor gates.
somethings up in the server?

(bb log says nothing about this massive grief)
[/quote]I think I know whats going on but mitb is not on so I can’t do anything about it.[/quote]

anyways, i’ve repaired almost everything; and realised that some pistons turned into the block they were next to. 3 of them were iron blocks ._.

Read full topic

item.title: Rollback pls? :)
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“hat trix, post:7, topic:410283”]i still dont understand how to do bb log. it tells me to place a log somewhere to see who changed the block?[/quote]Get a log from a tree then use /bb log. Place it somewhere to see who edited that block.

Read full topic

item.title: Rollback pls? :)
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

You need to use /bb log if nothing shows up it cant be rolled back.

Read full topic

item.title: Rollback pls? :)
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

yeah true. i forgot to mention. everything i had built within 30 minutes was still there, anything past that point was gone up untill the first 1 or 2 days i played. i dont care about whati just built, i want the stuff that disappeared, it was all the important shiz.

it also got all my mushroom farms and tree farms and my varrock west bank

Read full topic

item.title: Rollback pls? :)
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

Plus, if he got rolled back for griefing, how would what he built just before that still be there? And wouldn’t there be a post on the forums by someone saying that he griefed?

Read full topic

item.title: Rollback pls? :)
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

no… i didnt grief.
and i didnt get griefed.

i watched it happen… i was making a cobblestone generator using redstone and i broke one of the redstones on accident and it went like 10 blocks farther then what it was suposed to go then stopped. i fixed it and put it back the way it was, then i flipped a switch and everything disappeared right under my feet.

Read full topic

item.title: Rollback pls? :)
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

Possibilities:
You got rolled back for griefing
You got griefed

Read full topic
